channel.title: The Pirate Games on Pandaqi Blog
channel.description: Recent content in The Pirate Games on Pandaqi Blog

item.title: Pirate Drawingbeard
item.description: This is a devlog for my game “Pirate Drawingbeard” It’s kind of a “prequel” to my game “Pirate Riddlebeard”.

item.title: Pirate Riddlebeard
item.description: This is a devlog for my game “Pirate Riddlebeard” A large chunk of the work in this game went into writing the algorithm that generates the games.
